EmailTemplate.name: Customer Notification - MA NJ - Site Audit Scheduled
EmailTemplate.subject: Your site audit has been scheduled for {!Account.BillingAddress} on {!Opportunity.Site_Survey_Time__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
This is a reminder that you have a site survey scheduled for {!Opportunity.Site_Survey_Time__c}.
Our site surveyor should be arriving between start of appointment +1 hour. Please be advised that you need to be home for the entirety of this 3 hour appointment.
Please remember that we'll need access to your attic, as well as unobstructed access to your electrical panel.
We look forward to helping you on your journey toward sustainable energy production,
The Palmetto Team
1505 King St Ext #114, Charleston, SC 29405 Phone: (843) 720-1844
